nodes.text: A Bothan female Imperial agent once masqueraded as a hunting guide in a ploy to assassinate a group of undercover Alliance Intelligence agents on the planet Bothawui during the Galactic Civil War. Leading the agents on a hunting trip through Bothawui's northern ice fields, she was attacked by a wild ganjuko beast and sustained life-threatening injuries. The agents stabilized her condition with medpacs, allowing her to ambush them later on, only to be neutralized in the end.
